title: Interpretation of seeing a hairbrush in a dream for unmarried women

preview.html: Through the following article in the Encyclopedia of Interpretation, we present to you: Seeing a hairbrush in a dream is one of the visions that confuses the dreamer when he sees it in his dream, and then the matter becomes a little unknown to the dreamer or to the Prophet. Dream interpretation scholars, such as the scholar Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and others, have tried to investigate what The dreamer sees and comes to an interpretation of everything that may come to him in his sleep, even if it is strange by analogy. What was mentioned in the verses of the Qur’an or in the Sunnah of the Prophet, and among the dreams that scholars talked about, is seeing a brush in a dream. Seeing a hairbrush in a dream. In the following paragraph we explain the different meanings of this vision: A good and promising dream is seeing a clean, new hairbrush free of hair. It symbolizes The end of something that was bothering the dreamer and causing him distress and discomfort. A bad broken brush indicates that the dreamer or his partner is unhappy and that something is causing him sadness. The wooden brush indicates that there is someone who conspires against evil and wants to harm him. Plastic symbolizes the presence of someone close to The dreamer wants to see him happy and tries to achieve this. The silver comb indicates the dreamer’s good relationship with his relatives and the appetite for kinship with them. Seeing a student’s new brush is good news for success in his studies, while an old, unclean one is not considered a praiseworthy vision and may indicate the need to pay more attention To study it. Interpretation of seeing a hairbrush in a dream for a single woman. Below are the following points for all the interpretations related to the unmarried woman’s vision of this dream: The unmarried woman combing her hair indicates the extent of her wisdom and rationality. Seeing her in a new state symbolizes the occurrence of happy circumstances in the next period of life. The dreamer. Buying it in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates an upcoming engagement and wedding and the preparations she will make for marriage. Buying a golden comb in a dream indicates that a rich man will propose to her. The wood brush symbolizes the character’s man’s advances in her engagement. The silver or metal brush It indicates luck and success in all matters of work, studies, and family life. While the iron comb indicates the presence of opponents who hate her and wish her harm. Seeing a hairbrush in a dream for a married woman: A married woman’s suggestions when seeing a brush do not differ much from those of an unmarried woman, and we can explain this as follows: Iron in a married woman’s dream indicates enmity between her and someone, or that there is someone who hates her and wants to harm her. Since her husband was combing her hair, this was good for the upcoming pregnancy. If the husband was traveling and saw the wooden brush in a dream, this indicates that he will return soon, And God Almighty knows best. A clean brush in a dream for a married woman generally means goodness and livelihood for the woman and her family by God’s command. These were the interpretations of seeing a hairbrush in a dream, according to dream interpretation scholars, but what must be realized is that these interpretations cannot be taken for granted, No errors can be tolerated, as they are not based on elements

title: The meaning of a dream about tobacco in Ibn Sirin’s dream

preview.html: The meaning of a dream about tobacco in a dream and its interpretation varies from one world to another, and it has several connotations that differ depending on the details of this smoke in terms of density, color, and the presence of fire or not. Details in this article. The meaning of a dream about tobacco in a dream. Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, says: Smoke in a dream indicates something that is not good, and indicates torment, as he interpreted it as follows: Seeing smoke in a dream shows God’s punishment of the corrupt and corrupt on earth. It can indicate Also to the punishment that will be imposed on the dreamer from a person who has authority over him, or a punishment that will be inflicted on him from his boss or manager at work. Smoke coming out without fire or fire in the dream. The interpretation of smoke coming from a place without any fire or damage or the presence of a fire in the dream indicates A different sign: The smoke coming out without fire is an indication of passing the test. It also indicates the dreamer’s good appearance after fatigue and effort. As for the smoke rising over the one who saw it, it is a bad omen and evidence of illness. It could also be a sign of sadness and anxiety. Also, seeing Smoke rising without fire can indicate accusations, doubts, or injustices that the viewer is exposed to in life. It can mean pleasant surprises in some cases. White smoke in general in a dream means pleasant surprises, kindness, and comfort. While black, especially if it is thick, indicates Fears and problems, but they are temporary and disappear quickly. Seeing smoke in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of this vision for a single woman has a different and distinct meaning, which is as follows: Smoking in a dream for a girl who is not yet married may indicate that she has received false promises. Or taking a false oath from someone. If a woman sees If an unmarried woman in her dream sees smoke coming from a place she knows in reality, it means that she will receive news from that specific place in the coming days. Also, seeing smoke may indicate that there are some fears in reality. It can also mean that she is facing some obstacles in life. It could It also means confusion in decision-making. The meaning of seeing smoking in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees himself smoking in a dream indicates the following: Good news for reaching a wonderful place. Or being promoted to a higher position. But it also has a sign that the position will pass. As quickly as the smoke from the sky disappears completely. Interpretation of black smoke in a dream As we explained, the details of the smoke and its color contribute to the different interpretation of the vision and its results, which are as follows: Black smoke in a dream is a bad sign and bad news. It can also warn of difficult times that the dreamer is going through Where smoke comes out means bad news from that place. It can also mean sadness and mourning. Interpretation of seeing fire smoke in a dream for a girl. Black smoke in a dream means that it is not good: It may mean the death of someone close to the girl. It can also indicate sadness and mourning. It can That means misfortunes and fears in general. Seeing light smoke in a dream. Imam Ibn Sirin explained the meaning of this for a married woman as follows: It could be a reflection of a good psychological state. It could mean that changes in

title: Henna symbol in a dream on the hands

preview.html: Henna in a dream has many meanings and connotations that vary between good and evil, and this is what we explain today through the following lines from our website gptafser.com/ for men and women. Interpretation of seeing henna on the hands in a dream for a single girl. An unmarried girl who sees a stranger putting henna on her hands and embarrassing him in a dream. It is a sign of the appearance of a good man in her life who is approaching her, and she feels his love at this time in her life, and God knows best. As for the engaged woman who saw her fiancé putting henna on her hands in her dream, she was happy. It is considered a symbol that they will soon set the date for their wedding, and God knows best. An unmarried girl sees She herself applies henna to her hands in a dream. Good news that she will soon marry a handsome and fair young man who will be the reason for her happiness. Watching the appearance of henna on her hands in an unmarried girl’s dream and she was happy about it. A good sign of getting rid of all the problems she suffers from in her life, and God knows best. See also: The appearance of henna on the legs in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing henna on the hands in a dream for a married woman. A married woman dreams of buying henna in a dream. It indicates her ability to finish something that has been on her mind for a long time, and God knows best. It indicates her ability to manage her household affairs properly. And it is true, and God knows best. A married woman sees her husband drawing henna on her hands in a dream and she looks beautiful. This indicates that she is living a stable married life, and feels happy with him, and God knows best. Perhaps the vision also indicates that the dreamer has been liberated from all the problems that she suffered from in the past. This period of her life, and God knows best. The dream of applying large amounts of henna on the hands in a dream is for a married woman. It is a bad vision for her because it symbolizes many problems and crises in her life in general. It also means that there is a major dispute with her husband, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing henna on the hands In a dream for a man and its meaning: Seeing a man drawing henna on his hands in a dream, and that was beautiful and consistent in the dream. An indication of the ability of insight to achieve his goals and desires in his life, and God knows best. This also means good luck and hearing good news from the fortuneteller. And when a man dreams of himself putting henna on His wife’s hands in a dream. A metaphor for the appearance of pregnancy for his wife, which makes her very happy with the news, and God is the Most High. A man observes the presence of henna on his hands beautifully in a dream. It will be a good sign of the gains he will achieve in his work during this period, and God knows best. It indicates that he will obtain A big promotion at work, and God knows best. Either the man who is watching himself applies henna to his hands in a dream. It symbolizes that he will solve all the problems he is suffering from at this time. It is the beginning of a new happy phase in his life, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about applying Henna on the hair of a divorced woman. The meaning of seeing henna on the hands in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. In the event that henna is seen on the hands of a pregnant woman, and it has different and beautiful colors in the dream. Good news of the birth of a beautiful woman who will be her supporter in life, and God knows best. Or seeing black henna on the hands of a pregnant woman in a dream. .

title: Interpretation of an unmarried woman’s dream about giving birth to Ibn Sirin on different occasions

preview.html: In the following article, through the encyclopedia, we present to you the interpretation of one’s dream when he has a child, with all the details in which this dream can be seen by an unmarried woman, an unmarried girl. The world of dreams has become a very strange topic and no one has been able to find a scientific explanation for it, but despite This is the truth, so there is nothing preventing a person from seeing these events during his sleep, which often differ depending on the viewer’s psychology and thoughts at that period of his life. Visions had great importance and influence on people’s lives since ancient times, all the way back to the era of the Prophet Yusuf bin Yaqoub, peace be upon them, when he was a boy. . He saw in a dream eleven stars and the sun and moon prostrating, which had an impact on his son’s future, which made him advise him to hide his dreams from his brothers, which is what was stated in Surah Yusuf, verse 5 (He said: O my son, do not tell your brother about your vision, because they will draw the following paragraphs for you). One dream interpretation When he has a childIn the following paragraph, we present to you the most important things that dream interpreters mentioned about seeing an unmarried woman in a dream about a male child: Seeing a handsome boy indicates kindness and a broad halal diet for unmarried women. Seeing a smiling child in a dream symbolizes entering an experience A new woman in her life will gain a lot of good from it, by God’s command. Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing a beautiful baby girl in a dream for an unmarried girl means that you will be relieved of worries and anxiety. If the unmarried woman was looking for a new job at the time of her dream, it is good that she will get the job she wants. , which makes her happy and allows her to succeed. On the other hand, seeing a small child who is sad and angry is considered an unpleasant and unpromising vision, as it indicates that the dreamer is going through a problem or obstacle that makes her worry, God forbid. Seeing a small child laughing in a dream indicates that a woman She is unmarried and will soon marry a good young man with good morals, with whom she will find happiness and live in prosperity, and after her marriage she will give birth to a beautiful son, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about many children for single people: You may see one child in a dream, not one child, but many children, and the interpretation of this is A dream about one child is as follows: Seeing an unmarried woman indicates that there are many young children approaching her, crawling and playing with laughter and fun. It is one of the best visions that you can see in a dream because of the good news it brings, as it shows a complete change in her situation and the fulfillment of everything she wished for for her future. It may indicate the death of distress that the dreamer suffered from, and it also promises good news of recovery from the illness that afflicted her, but God He will heal her from it soon, by God’s will. Embracing a young child in a single’s dream Perhaps embracing young children is one of the most satisfying things for any person, male, female, or single, but it can have a great impact on the girl herself when she sees her in a dream, as it develops feelings of motherhood within her. Which they are. It has been inside her since childhood, so she rushes to search for an interpretation of the dream, which we will present in the following points: An unmarried woman hugging a child in a dream indicates...

title: Interpretation of seeing a sword in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a sword for a man A man who sees a sword placed on his head, this is evidence of a high status and high position among creatures. What if he sees many swords The vision indicates promotion through work and then an increase in capital. As breaking the sword is evidence of separation or dismissal from work, and exposure to many crises and disputes in life. It indicates watching breaking the sword in a dream, about divorce from the partner or the loss and death of a family member. But if he sees in a dream a fence or a knife from someone, this is evidence of cooperation in the field of work or trade, or a family lineage relationship. And seeing the sword indicates a connection in a short period and God knows best. After that, a metal sword indicates the strength of the seer and the joy of courage and generosity. Likewise, if he sees the sword in the sheath, this is evidence of marriage to a righteous and pious girl. Also, seeing the sword from the beginning is evidence of the wealth of the monarch. Then it indicates honor, pride and dignity. A wooden sword indicates hypocrisy and lies. Interpretation of a dream about a silver sword in a dream I see a silver sword It announces lawful livelihood and profit from the field of work. It is also one of the promising visions of goodness and expansion of scope Nutrition. Like the art of fencing, explain the bad words of others, and waste money without benefit. Interpretation of seeing a sword in a dream for a married woman The sword of a married woman expresses pride and a sense of security. Then it shows good nutrition for the offspring. As for if she sees that her husband gives her a sword in a dream, it is evidence of pregnancy, and God knows best. Buying a married sword is evidence of finding a job or work. Or get a lot of money. Then if she dreams of telling someone about her sword, this is evidence of distinction and success in her life. The sword of a married woman indicates goodness and truth as well as justice after defeating enemies. Sword for married people It indicates the death of worry and sadness and a short period and the truth appears. Dreaming of a stolen, lost or falling sword Stealing a sword in a dream indicates exposure to looting and theft, then loss and loss. The fortuneteller will lose one of his most valuable and things. Stealing a sword in a dream shows weakness and a feeling of insecurity and fear, then a close separation from him appears. Stealing a sword in a dream indicates hearing sad and unpleasant news for a period of time, the dreamer's mental state is bad. Dreaming of fencing and hitting with a sword in a dream I watch a sword strike in a dream, indicates That the dreamer will reach a high position and honor or fight for the Creator. But if he sees in a dream that he is being stabbed with a sword, this is evidence of stabbing him with obscene words. Seeing the threat of a sword or knife and not stabbing suggests that he intended to speak and remained silent and did not speak. Interpretation of the art of fencing in a dream indicates that the dreamer will approach God and his interest if he strives in the way of God. It also indicates pride and honor. Seeing yourself fighting with a sword in a dream indicates competition with someone, and this is if the dreamer sees the sword in the hand of another person. Hitting others with a sword in a dream means being sharp-tongued. As for the opposite, it indicates being exposed to words that do not please the impression. Hitting with a sword in a dream

Seeing yourself fighting with a sword in A dream indicates competition with someone, and this is if the dreamer sees a sword in the hand of another person. Striking others with a sword in a dream means having a sharp tongue. The opposite indicates being exposed to words that do not satisfy the impression. Striking with a sword in a dream means being sharp-tongued.

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a bird in a dream for an unmarried woman?  A bird in his hand in a dream is for an unmarried woman, a yellow bird in a dream is for an unmarried woman, and a white bird in a dream is for an unmarried woman.

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bird in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a bird is considered one of the happy visions for the soul, and there are many interpretations about it among both jurists and psychologists. Seeing a bird has many connotations that vary based on many considerations, including the color of the bird, as it may be white. , black or green, and it can be colored or yellow, and the bird can be in the hand or in the cage, and it can escape from it. What concerns us in this article is that we study all the specific cases and signals of seeing a bird in a dream for a single woman. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a vision? A bird in a dream for an unmarried woman? A bird in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a bird expresses the joy, enjoyment, and happiness of the soul in satisfying what it loves, and happiness, profit, and benefit according to your work and effort, and the integrity of intention and purity of the soul from the doubts of the world. This vision also indicates women and their conversations, and meetings that They gather from time to time, consult on many topics, and cooperate with some of the advice and instructions that are recited in these intimate councils and gatherings. The bird may seem small and resourceful, but seeing it in a dream represents high status, power, prestige, and prestige, reaping many profits and fruits, and obtaining a period Full of positive developments and changes at all levels. On the other hand, this vision symbolizes the person who is doing her best and does not receive proper appreciation, as she desperately attempts to prove herself and show different skills and abilities, but to no avail for others to recognize her. And if the unmarried woman sees that she has A bird, this indicates that she accompanies a woman similar to her in characteristics and attributes and the tendency to choose someone who has the same aspirations and goals and share them with her in her future projects and plans. An exchange of worries and anxieties. And if she sees that she is hunting a bird that was trying to escape from her, this indicates the money that she earns after long difficulties and difficulties and her ability to achieve her goals and desires, no matter how the circumstances fluctuate in her and the wind leads. Her misguidance, and the insistence on fighting battles, even if they are difficult. The bird in the individual dream of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the bird indicates a high status among people, and is characterized by a degree of danger if he disagrees with some, and he can have knowledge and knowledge without benefiting from it in anything referred to. If a girl sees a bird, this expresses her acquisition of different experiences, knowledge, and openness to different cultures. She may travel in the near future or move from one place to another in search of a goal and certain opportunities. Seeing a bird in her dream is also a sign of the confusion and disappointment that she sees in her life. , which makes others feel pity and sympathy for her, and some may be amazed by unexpected achievements and successes. This vision can be an indication of a love of fun and laughter for others, and the enjoyment of a fair shadow and the ability to seize hearts, attract attention, and get people out of their problems and concerns with jokes and sense of humor. If an unmarried woman sees that she is hunting a bird, this indicates that she will fall in love with a village person

title: Interpretation of fasting in a dream

preview.html: Fasting is one of the pillars and pillars of religion, and fasting is one of the good things a person does, but the interpretation of fasting in a dream has implications that differ from the meaning of fasting in reality. Religion and piety, and the meaning of fasting in a dream varies depending on the circumstances of the insight. Interpretation of fasting in a dream for a single woman and an unmarried girl who actually fasts to please God Almighty and achieve a worldly matter. When she sees in her dream that she is fasting, this is evidence of her desire to please God and that she is avoiding everything. Which makes him angry. Also, seeing her fasting in a dream indicates that God Almighty will give her a good and righteous husband, and indicates that she will get everything she desires in this world or that she will get travel or work. Fasting is one of the good deeds and evidence of the perfection of religion and faith, and if the girl sees For a married woman in a dream that she is fasting, this means that she is facing the temptations present in life in order to obtain God’s satisfaction. Interpretation of fasting in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman in a dream that she is fasting is evidence of her loyalty to her home and husband, and that she is constantly trying to make her husband and children happy and trying to preserve her home. If she sees If a married woman sees in a dream that she is fasting, then if a married woman is fasting during the month of Ramadan, it is evidence that she has stopped fulfilling it. And she saw empty dishes in a dream, then this is a sign that there are problems in her family and she must try to solve the problems. Interpretation of fasting in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees that she is fasting and her belly grows before her eyes, this is a sign that she will give birth to a boy. If a pregnant woman sees that she is fasting during a month other than Ramadan, then this is a sign However, she will achieve everything she wants and gain a great status. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she fasted for only one day, this is evidence that she has committed some sins, and she must repent sincerely. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is fasting under a vow, this is evidence that she will satisfy the need she wants, and remove worry. And anxiety. When she dreams that she is fasting and waiting for breakfast, the dream is a strong indicator of the recovery of a sick person in the family. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is fasting and breaking her fast before sunset, then the dream indicates that she has lied a lot, and she must repent for this sin. Interpretation of fasting in a dream for a man. Seeing a man In a dream, it indicates that he is fasting, evidence of the goodness and blessing that he receives in his life. If a man is sick and sees in a dream that he is fasting, this indicates his recovery. And whoever sees that he is fasting and that the fast is long, this indicates his repentance from sins and disobedience and that God Almighty accepts his repentance. To see a man Fasting during the month of Ramadan is evidence that prices will rise and that the country will suffer from a major financial crisis. Whoever sees in a dream that he is fasting, and does not know whether he is fasting in Ramadan or in another month, this is evidence of a vow that he did not fulfill, and he must fulfill what he vowed. For more interpretation of dreams, Visit the Live Dreams app.

Also, seeing the completion of a mother’s marriage to a stranger in a dream means that the term is close and misfortunes in reality. Seeing a mother marrying a complete father in a dream shows that this is one of the visions that indicate justice. Good and great in these circumstances. Also, seeing the mother marrying the father again in a girl’s dream indicates her success and the fulfillment of her desires. Seeing a mother’s wedding in a dream with a married woman indicates that she She will move to a new, better place for her and her life will be happy. Whoever sees in her dream that her mother is getting married and beautifying herself while she is married, this indicates the greatness of her husband and his good spirit. A mother’s marriage in a dream is complete for a pregnant woman. Marriage in a dream is complete for a pregnant woman in general is one of the visions that indicate that she will achieve A lot of benefits during the next period of her life. Seeing a mother’s full wedding in a dream shows a pregnant woman a happy new life full of love and joy. I dreamed that my mother got married and my father died. Seeing this dream is one of the dreams that indicates goodness and comfort from God and is a harbinger of the end of sorrows. For a young man, this vision also means That God will give him a good and kind wife in his next life. For the married dreamer, the end of problems and his transition to a better position, whether in his work, in his travels, or in an important matter awaiting him. title: Seeing a dream about driving and driving a car in a dream and interpreting the dream about driving without a license

preview.html: Driving dream, interpreters believe that the dream indicates goodness and brings a lot of news to the pioneer, but it may symbolize evil in some cases, and in the lines of this article we will talk about the interpretation of the driving vision for single and married women. And pregnant women and men according to Ibn Sirin and the leading scholars of interpretation. Driving in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of driving in a dream? The interpretation of a dream about driving shows that the dreamer is planning to start a new project in his professional life and expects great success. It has been said that the vision of driving symbolizes the presence of competitors at work, but This issue does not negatively affect the dreamer, but rather increases his diligence and enthusiasm at work. Regular driving a car in a dream is an indication that the dreamer is a responsible person who does not neglect his duties and performs them to the fullest extent. Driving in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing driving does not It bodes well. If the dreamer dreams that he is driving a car quickly and recklessly, this indicates sickness and illness, and falling out of the car while driving it in the dream is an indication that the dreamer will hear unpleasant news about a member of his family in the coming days. If the car breaks down while driving, then the dream symbolizes sadness and anxiety and warns of Negative changes in the coming period of the dreamer’s life. Driving in the vision also indicates a transition from one stage to another in life or a move from one place to another, but if the dreamer drives the car calmly and carefully, the dream portends an abundance of goodness and an abundance of survival. A specialized Egyptian website. It includes a group of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google. The dream of driving for a single woman. The interpretation of the dream of driving for a single woman bodes well, as it indicates facilitating her difficult matters, achieving her dreams, and getting what she wants in the near future. Driving in a dream is an indication that the woman who dreams is postponing marriage. At this time because she believes that this may delay her in achieving her goals, but if the dreamer is driving a car and traveling abroad, then the dream warns her that she will soon marry a handsome man who will fall in love with him at first sight and enjoy a calm and stable married life. Driving in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman driving A car is a good thing and shows that she is happy with her married life and loves her husband very much, and it symbolizes hearing sad news in the coming days. Driving a luxury car in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her success in managing her internal affairs and managing her life. Driving in a dream for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about driving for a pregnant woman indicates getting rid of problems. Pregnancy problems and her remaining months passing forever. If the dreamer drives a black car in her dream, she will have good news about her success in her professional life and the improvement of her financial income in the near future. If the pregnant woman is driving a white car, the dream indicates her intelligence, wisdom, and enjoyment of many skills that help her excel and advance. Driving a car in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing a man turning into a child in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a man turning into a child: Ibn Sirin says that seeing a man becoming a child in a dream indicates the dreamer’s inability to bear responsibility. And if a man sees that he is turning into a child in a dream, this vision indicates that he is unable to make the right decisions. Seeing an old man getting younger in a dream It means that the dreamer has good health and a strong mind, and that God Almighty is All-Knowing. It is possible to cross the vision of a man and then turn into a child in the dreamer’s dream, and that he will overcome all the consequences and difficulties that he faces. Interpretation of seeing an old man turning into a child in a dream, according to Ibn Shirin’s vision of a man turning An old woman with a child in a dream, it means the arrival of kindness, abundant living, and abundant money. If a married woman sees that she is an old woman and gives birth to a child in a dream, then this dream indicates happiness and family stability. If a pregnant woman sees an old woman becoming a child in her dream, this vision means that she will recover soon, God willing. Seeing the transition from old age to youth in a dream means that the dreamer will receive a lot of money as an inheritance. Interpretation of seeing a smaller person in a dream: Ibn Sirin showed that seeing a man getting smaller in a dream means that his life will change for the better. If women see their bodies getting smaller in a dream, this dream indicates Her nostalgia for the beautiful days of her childhood, and God knows best. Seeing a change in a person’s body in a dream means that he commits many sins and must approach God and repent to Him. Seeing someone fitting a dwarf in a dream means that he will be exposed to a major financial crisis in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing a girl She turns into a child in a dream. A girl who sees that she has become a child in a dream shows the weakness of her character and her inability to make her own decisions. And if she sees herself turning into a little girl, this indicates in a dream her inability to bear responsibility, and God knows best. It may express the vision that the unmarried woman returned to being a child. In her dream, she will be exposed to a serious financial crisis in the coming period. Seeing a girl turning into a child in a dream symbolizes that she is on the right path and must continue to do so to achieve what she wants. Interpretation of seeing a return to youth in a dream: If one sees in a dream that he has returned to the stage of youth, This dream means that the dreamer enjoys good health and prosperity. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a return to youth in a dream indicates the weakness of the dreamer’s faith and abandonment of his prayers. The dreamer seeing someone who knows returns to his youth in a dream, you will live a happy life in the coming period by God’s command. The dreamer’s vision He goes back to his youth, symbolizing that he will meet someone close to him that he has not seen for a long time, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing an old man turn into a young man in a dreamIbn Sirin explained that seeing an old man turn into a young man in a dream symbolizes the coming of kindness, abundant living, and abundant money. If The dreamer saw that the old man had become young, and this dream indicates in his dream his good behavior among people, and God knows best. But if the young man sees that he has grown old, then this vision shows his inability to bear difficult responsibilities. This dream can
